From the light given me, the managers of all our institutions, and especially of newly established sanitariums, are to be careful to economize in the expenditure of means, that they may be in a position to help similar institutions that are to be established in other parts of the world. Even if they have a large amount of money 
                                                                           100
in the treasury, they should make every plan with reference to the needs of God's great missionary field.
